description.value:
You make an incredibly graceful attack, piercing your foe's defenses. Make a Strike with a weapon or unarmed attack that would apply your precise strike damage, with the following failure effect.

Failure You deal half your @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.classfeatures.Precise Strike]{Precise Strike} damage to the target. This damage type is that of the weapon or unarmed attack you used for the Strike.
